member.name: T:Aequus.Common.Graphics.Rendering.Tiles.IBatchedTile
member.summary:
Grants a ModTile the ability to render post-draw elements in a batch to reduce on Begin/End calls.
Place SpecialTileDrawing.Add(i, j, Type); into ModTile.PostDraw(...) to add it to the rendering list.

member.name: F:Aequus.AequusProjectile.itemData
member.summary: Custom data to be used by items which utilize the interface. This data is synced in multiplayer.

member.name: F:Aequus.AequusProjectile.noSpecialEffects
member.summary: If this is true, special effects should be disabled on the projectile. This is only set to true by Javelin-like projectiles.

member.name: F:Aequus.AequusProjectile.isProjectileChild
member.summary: Whether this projectile was spawned by another projectile. Use this to prevent effects occuring multiple times (Like ammo retrival)

member.summary: A few item results which are ignored by the Shimmer Monocle, so that common transmuations don't have crappy bloated tooltips.

member.summary: Contains item ids which are classified as 'Health Pickups'.

member.name: F:Aequus.Content.DataSets.ItemSets.IsManaPickup
member.summary: Contains item ids which are classified as 'Mana Pickups'.

member.name: F:Aequus.Content.DataSets.ItemSets.IsPickup
member.summary:
Contains items ids which are classified as 'Pickups', which are generally items which do not appear in your inventory. Instead they grant some sort of effect.
This set includes data from and .

member.name: F:Aequus.Content.DataSets.ItemSets.ImportantItem
member.summary:
Items marked as important will have special properties:
If this item is inside a chest, the chest will not gain Aequus loot, or Hardmode Chest Loot.

member.name: F:Aequus.Content.DataSets.NPCSets.StatSpeedBlacklist
member.summary: NPCs in this set cannot get speed increases or decreases. This usually contains bosses, or other special NPCs like worm segments.

member.name: F:Aequus.Content.DataSets.NPCSets.FriendablePreHardmodeSlime
member.summary: Used for Royal Gel's Crown of Blood combination.

member.name: F:Aequus.Content.DataSets.NPCSets.FriendableHardmodeSlime
member.summary: Used for Volatile Gelatin's Crown of Blood combination.

member.name: F:Aequus.Content.DataSets.NPCSets.Unfriendable
member.summary: Enemies in this set cannot become friendly. This usually contains bosses, or other special NPCs like worm segments.

member.name: F:Aequus.Content.DataSets.NPCSets.DealsHeatDamage
member.summary: NPCs in this set deal 'heat' contact damage. This damage can be resisted using the Frost Potion.

member.name: F:Aequus.Content.DataSets.NPCSets.PrefixBlacklist
member.summary: NPCs in this set cannot become Elites. This usually contains bosses.

member.name: F:Aequus.Content.DataSets.ProjectileSets.DealsHeatDamage
member.summary: Projectiles in this set deal 'heat' damage. This damage can be resisted using the Frost Potion.

member.name: M:Aequus.PlayerHelper.GetPlayerFocusPosition(Terraria.Player)
member.summary:
Gets the "Player Focus". This is by default the player's centre, but when using the Drone, this returns the drone's position.
This position is used to make Radon Fog disappear when approched by the player, or by their controlled drone.
This position also ignores camera panning effects, like screen shakes, scoping, ect.

member.name: M:Aequus.PlayerHelper.SpawnEnchantmentDusts(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Vector2,Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Vector2,Terraria.Player,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Spawns Flask and other "Enchantment" dusts, like the Magma Stone flames.
member.returns: A potential dust instance, if any spawn. If none spawn, the result will be null.

member.name: M:Aequus.PlayerHelper.WeirdNPCHitRestrictions(Terraria.NPC)
member.summary: Checks weird damage restrictions for NPCs. This literally only checks for Fairies as of right now.
member.returns: Whether the enemy should be immune to this hit (true = Do not hit)

member.name: M:Aequus.TextHelper.Seconds(System.Double)
member.summary: Converts ticks to seconds, up to 1 decimal place.

member.summary: Broadcasts a message. Only does something when is not equal to .
